description.0: A rare weapon whose origin is the ancient ocean. One can hear the sound of the ageless waves as one swings it.

0.0: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <cryo>6%</cryo> more DMG and take <cryo>3%</cryo> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

1.0: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <cryo>7%</cryo> more DMG and take <cryo>2.7%</cryo> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

2.0: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <cryo>8%</cryo> more DMG and take <cryo>2.4%</cryo> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

3.0: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <cryo>9%</cryo> more DMG and take <cryo>2.2%</cryo> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.

4.0: Every 4s a character is on the field, they will deal <cryo>10%</cryo> more DMG and take <cryo>2%</cryo> more DMG. This effect has a maximum of 5 stacks and will not be reset if the character leaves the field, but will be reduced by 1 stack when the character takes DMG.
